discussions.title: Local Train Frequency Issue - Western Line
discussions.content: During peak hours, trains are too crowded. Need more frequency between Churchgate and Virar.

repliesData.author: WR_Official
repliesData.content: We are adding 12 new services from next month. हम पिछले महीने से नई सेवाएँ जोड़ रहे हैं।

discussions.title: Garbage Dumping at Powai Lake
discussions.content: People are dumping waste near Powai Lake. This is affecting water quality and environment.

repliesData.author: BMC_LakeDept
repliesData.content: We have installed CCTV cameras and increased patrols. जल्द ही कार्रवाई की जाएगी।

discussions.title: Street Lights Not Working in Chembur
discussions.content: Many street lights are not working in Chembur Camp area. Safety concern for women and senior citizens.

repliesData.author: MSEDCL_Engineer
repliesData.content: Repair work will start from tomorrow. कल से मरम्मत का काम शुरू होगा।

discussions.title: Mobile Network Issue in Malad West
discussions.content: Very poor mobile network in Orlem area. Affecting work from home and online classes.

discussions.title: Public Toilet Maintenance in Dadar
discussions.content: Public toilets near Dadar station are very dirty and poorly maintained. Need immediate attention.

repliesData.author: BMC_Sanitation
repliesData.content: Cleaning contract has been renewed. Regular maintenance will be ensured.

discussions.title: School Bus Safety Measures
discussions.content: Need GPS tracking and female attendants in all school buses for children safety.

repliesData.author: RTO_Official
repliesData.content: New guidelines being issued for all school buses. स्कूल बसों के लिए नए दिशा-निर्देश जारी किए जा रहे हैं।

discussions.title: Water Supply Problem in Virar
discussions.content: Irregular water supply in Virar East area. Many days only 1 hour water available.

repliesData.author: WaterDept_Official
repliesData.content: Pipeline repair work ongoing. Supply will normalize in 3 days.

discussions.title: Park Maintenance in Kharghar
discussions.content: Children's play equipment in sector 12 park is broken. Need repair and maintenance.

discussions.title: Digital Classroom Implementation
discussions.content: Request for smart boards and digital learning tools in municipal schools.

repliesData.author: Education_Dept
repliesData.content: Budget approved for 100 smart classrooms. Installation starts next month.

discussions.title: Ambulance Service Response Time
discussions.content: 108 ambulance service taking too long to reach in suburban areas. Need improvement.

repliesData.author: Health_Director
repliesData.content: Adding 20 new ambulances to fleet. Response time will improve.

discussions.title: Hawker Zone Allocation in Borivali
discussions.content: Proper hawker zones needed near station to reduce traffic congestion.

discussions.title: Library Timings Extension
discussions.content: Request to extend library timings for students during exam season.

repliesData.author: Library_Dept
repliesData.content: Timings extended till 9 PM during exam months. परीक्षा के महीनों में समय बढ़ाया गया।

discussions.title: Dengue Prevention Measures
discussions.content: Need fogging and cleanliness drive to control mosquito breeding in monsoon.

repliesData.author: BMC_Health
repliesData.content: Fogging schedule intensified. 500 teams deployed across city.

discussions.title: Footpath Repair in South Mumbai
discussions.content: Broken footpaths causing accidents, especially for senior citizens.

discussions.title: Online Education Portal Issues
discussions.content: State education portal frequently down during admission season.

repliesData.author: IT_Education
repliesData.content: Server capacity increased. Issues should be resolved now.

discussions.title: Bus Stop Shelter Repair
discussions.content: Bus stop shelters damaged in last storm. Need repair before monsoon.

discussions.title: Medical Camp Organization
discussions.content: Request for regular free medical camps in slum areas.

repliesData.author: Health_Director
repliesData.content: Monthly medical camps scheduled in all zones. सभी क्षेत्रों में मासिक मेडिकल कैंप शेड्यूल किए गए।

discussions.title: Cycling Track Proposal
discussions.content: Need dedicated cycling tracks on coastal roads for fitness and environment.

discussions.title: Waste Segregation Awareness
discussions.content: Need more awareness programs about waste segregation at source.

repliesData.author: BMC_Awareness
repliesData.content: Door-to-door campaign starting next week. अगले सप्ताह से दरवाजे-दरवाजे अभियान शुरू हो रहा है।

discussions.title: Street Food Hygiene Standards
discussions.content: Need better hygiene monitoring for street food vendors.
